Level 15
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 15
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, January 5, 2002 - 08:36 pm:

My speech:OK,EVERYONE LONG TIME ME NO MAKE THE GUIDE,OK,NOW I'M BORED(I'M ALWAYS BORED,LOL),I'll continue creating the guide,but some stages,I forgotten how to defeat them,But I'll try,but I need you all to co-operate,as some stages,can be defeated by monster,but some can still be defeated by strategic timing and planning though. So catch any monsters you'll face,or face the ordeals,of which I forget how to conquer some stages.

LEVEL 15

There are two options in this stage,if you are un skilled,at the start,go right 1 step,and jump up to take the fireworks. If you are skilled,than you need not do that. Move all the way to the left,and destroy all the boxes,so that the Jell will fall to its death. After that,wait for the other Jell,to get to the wooden crate,and destroy the Jell,causing it to fall to its death. You should than be standing at the door,facing right,create a box,than jump up the box,and jump up to the metal ledge. Go right 2 steps,and jump up the higher metal ledge. While facing elft,create a box,and jump on it. Wait for the Jell to go to the left,if than as before,if you are unskilled,just jump up and shoot the Jell with the fireowork's,create box,grab the key,than win the stage by going down rightwards,as before. Or if you are skilled,or don't want to waste your fireworks',just jump up the ledge. When the Jell is rushing towards the right,trying to kill you,just jump to the left,go to the edge of the metal ledge,than create a box,and climb to get the key,before the Jell come back. Than after that,jump down to the ledge,of the lower Jell,when it's not around,than destroy,the box,between you and it,than after that,destroy the box it is standing on. Than Jump down to victory.
